About Us

Your Trusted Immigration Partner

We are a professional team specializing in Hungary's Golden Visa program, dedicated to providing Chinese families with transparent, efficient, and compliant European residency solutions.

Our Mission

In today's globalized world, more and more families are seeking broader opportunities and better quality of life. We understand that immigration is not just a legal process, but an important family decision and a new chapter in life.

As a bridge connecting China and Hungary, our team consists of experienced immigration consultants, legal experts, and localization service personnel. We have in-depth knowledge of both countries' cultures, regulations, and market environments to provide you with the most caring and professional service.

Our mission is to help every family smoothly and confidently start their new European life, achieving better education, career, and quality of life.

How We Help You

From initial consultation to successful approval and settling in, we provide comprehensive support

1

Free Initial Assessment

Understand your background, needs, and goals, provide initial feasibility assessment, and recommend the most suitable investment path

2

Customized Solution Design

Based on your family situation, financial arrangements, and timeline, create a personalized application strategy and schedule

3

Investment Matching & Support

Connect with reliable investment institutions, provide real estate, bonds, and business investment options, and assist with investment decisions

4

Professional Document Preparation

Provide detailed checklists, guide material preparation, offer professional translation and notarization services to ensure documents meet official requirements

5

Application Submission & Follow-up

Assist with completing application forms, scheduling interviews, submitting materials, tracking approval progress in real-time, and handling supplementary requests

6

Post-Approval Services

Assist with collecting residence permits, provide renewal reminders, settling support (housing, education, healthcare, etc.), and long-term companionship
